00008 typedef void *t_systhread;
00009 
00010 // Generic x-platform thread API
00011 long systhread_create(method entryproc, void *arg, long stacksize, long priority, long flags, t_systhread *thread);
00012 long systhread_terminate(t_systhread thread);
00013 void systhread_sleep(long milliseconds);
00014 void systhread_exit(long status);
00015 void *systhread_self(void);

00019 short systhread_istimerthread(void);
